title: Mouse color contrast setting please Riot!!!
body: When i get into fights in general i tend to lose my cursor to the back round or the fight. I don't know if there is a setting to fix that or not but i have looked and haven't seen any settings for it. Am i missing the setting? If not please Riot can we jump on the horn for this setting?

replies.body:
Sadly, I also suffer from this problem V_V'....

I'm not entirely sure if this would help very much, but I would maybe try running your pc in colorblind mode to see if those colors stand out a little bit more so that you can find your mouse.
